column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Gen B. - Thanks for your great review. We are most appreciative of your kind words
column2: especially since you have been around the block when it comes to ramen in Houston. We always suggest adding fresh-pressed garlic to our ramen for that extra punch you mention. But otherwise
column3: I'm beyond pleased you consider us one of your favorites
column4: and we hope to serve you again soon.
